Class LoanOfferList

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.model.LoanOfferList
public class LoanOfferList extends Object
Represents a list of Loan Offers available in our system. Provides methods to operate on a list of offers
Version:
0.4
Author:
Przemys≈Çaw Korzec

      Parameters:

    • getAllOffers

      public List<LoanOffer> getAllOffers()
      Returns all stored offers.
      Returns:
      a list of loan offers

    • findByBankName

      public LoanOffer findByBankName(String bankName)
      Finds a loan offer by bank name.
      Parameters:
      bankName - the name of the bank
      Returns:
      the found LoanOffer or null if not found

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all offers from the list.

    • findBestOffer

      public LoanOffer findBestOffer(CustomerProfile profile) throws NoMatchingOffersException
      Finds the best offer for the customer's data provided
      Parameters:
      profile - Customer's data
      Returns:
      Best loan offer
      Throws:
      NoMatchingOffersException - No matching offers in our system
